chapters.title: Chapter 6: A Knack
chapters.info: Nazar, p. 181—Soldier from Malkier. He put his hadori away as a child, but put it back on recently. He had white hair, and was at least seventy years old. He found Lan after word of his march to the Blight reached him. He died in a skirmish with Shadowspawn; Lan was tool late to save him. See also Andere.
